bytebase.store.RuleMetadata.schema.stric.description: RuleMetadata is the metadata for PostgreSQL rules.

action.description: The command(s) to execute when the rule fires.

condition.description: The WHERE condition of the rule (optional).

event.description: The event type of the rule: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE.

is_enabled.description: The is_enabled indicates whether the rule is enabled.

is_instead.description: The is_instead indicates whether this is an INSTEAD rule.

bytebase.store.RuleMetadata.schema.stric.title: Rule Metadata
